name: H. R. Vest
description:
WARNING: contains quick flashes of light, people with epilepsy, play at your own risk!

For Helena, it all started like every other day at work - with a big nap! But today, it's different. What is the purpose of the HARVEST research project? What dangers await for Helena? Become a scientist H. R. Vest in this ultra-short horror adventure and enjoy:

  • Elaborate in-game world that you can put hundreds of seconds into!
  • Beautiful, hand-drawn graphics!
  • Complex story with the option to choose how long you will read the dialogue!
  • Each game level contains a complex puzzle!

Controls

Note: Gamepad buttons are listed with the Xbox controller layout

  • WASD (keyboard) or Left stick (gamepad) - Movement
  • Shift (keyboard) or LB (gamepad) - Run
  • E (keyboard) or A (gamepad) - Use nearby item
  • Enter, Space (keyboard) or A (gamepad) - Confirm menu option

Tools used

  • Godot - game engine
  • Paper, watercolors and scanner - painting
  • Guitar, Ardour and AVL Drumkits - music
  • Phone recorder and Ardour/Audacity - sound effects
  • Explodomatica - burner sound effect
  • Kakoune - quick text edits

Team

  • Milan Vaško - Programming, sounds and music
  • NettlesCat - Graphics, level design and writing
